content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I understand you need electrical work done. May I please have your name to get started?
Nice to meet you, Linda. Could you please provide your address so we can confirm our service availability?
I live at 455 Oak Street, Springfield.
Thank you, Linda. Let me check that address for service coverage.
Good news! We do provide electrical services in your area. When would be an ideal time for our technician to come by?
Hmm, I need to check my calendar first to see when I am free... I don’t have it with me right now though.
No problem, Linda. Feel free to reach out whenever you have your schedule handy. We’ll be here to help you book the appointment.
reason: Customer unable to provide scheduling time
